title: Minnit Chat
shortDescription: Group chat with your visitors in real time
longDescription: Group chat with your visitors in real time with Minnit Chat! With customizable background images, color schemes, and other advanced options, your chat is uniquely yours. You can even assign moderators to watch your chat while you're away. No coding skills necessary to utilize Minnit's features.
instructions: Minnit Chat account required, see <https://minnit.chat/register> to sign up free.
author: Minnit LTD

categories.title: Add-ons
categories.description: Drop-in components to add to your website.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

aboutminnit.helpvalue: Minnit Chat is a free HTML5 chatroom service. There is no cap to the number of users that can connect. You can upload your own background image, assign moderators, and allow your users to talk on your website while you're away. This is a great way to get repeat visitors.

chathelp.helpvalue:
Important: You must register on Minnit Chat to get your free HTML5 chatroom.

Click here to register

chatname.title: Enter your Minnit Chat name in the box below (required):

chatsize.description: Don't worry - Minnit Chat will always shrink to fit on smaller displays.
chatsize.title: What size do you want your Minnit Chat to be?

placement.title: Where do you want your Minnit Chat tab to appear?

chatheight.description: Select how tall your Minnit Chat should be. Taller chats allow more messages to be seen at once, but may reduce the readability of your website.
chatheight.title: Chat Height

versions.releaseNotes: Allows you to make your Minnit Chat taller, thanks to user feedback. This update also fixes a minor JS bug which took place during the installation procedure (never faced your production site). Enjoy!
